attributes.action: make it compulsive that all rottweilers and dangerous dogs are on leads in public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rottweilers and other dangerous dogs should be kept on a lead in public places. Too many of these dogs are bred to be aggressive. How many times do the public have to hear owners say,’ it’s all right, he's ok', before attacking children, dogs or any moving wildlife. Why doesn't the government make it compulsory to keep these animals on a lead. Either ban them, bring back the dog licence or the next time someone rings the police get the police to act quickly if a complaint has been made.
